dcterms:description: The ModelNet40 dataset is used for shape classification tasks and consists of CAD models in 40 categories. The dataset is split into 9843 training models and 2468 testing models, with point clouds generated from CAD models through uniform sampling.
dcterms:title: ModelNet40

dcterms:creator: L. Yi

L. Guibas
dcterms:description: ShapeNetPart is used for fine-grained 3D segmentation and contains 16881 shapes from 16 classes, with a total of 50 unique part classes.
dcterms:title: ShapeNetPart

dcterms:creator: I. Armeni
O. Sener
A. R. Zamir
H. Jiang
I. Brilakis
M. Fischer
S. Savarese
dcterms:description: The Stanford 3D Semantic Parsing Dataset is collected from large-scale indoor spaces and consists of point clouds from 271 rooms, with each point belonging to one of 13 categories.
dcterms:title: Stanford 3D Semantic Parsing Dataset
